statements: DELETE FROM VisualizationData WHERE user_id = 1 AND visualization_type = 'bar'
DELETE FROM VisualizationData WHERE data_segmentation = 'segment_2' AND data_value < 10
DELETE FROM VisualizationData WHERE user_id = 123 AND data_segmentation = 'segment_1';
DELETE FROM VisualizationData WHERE visualization_type IN ('chart', 'graph') AND data_value < 1000;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 101 AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM orders WHERE quantity <= 10 AND user_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
